sourcesContent:
Add Company Detail

Company Name shouldn't be empty Company Name shouldn't be under 5 char Company Name shouldn't be over 50 char
Address shouldn't be empty Address shouldn't be under 5 char Address shouldn't be over 150 char
Phone shouldn't be empty Phone shouldn't be under 8 char Phone shouldn't be over 20 char Phone is not valid, Phone can only be number
Company Url shouldn't be empty Company Url is not valid. (Ex: http://abc.org or https://abc.org)
